text:
Texas Biomedical Device Center | ONSITE in Dallas, TX | C/C++ developer

The Texas Biomedical Device Center is the Biomedical research commercialization center for the University of Texas at Dallas. We're looking for a good C/C++ programmer that has experience with embedded products and debugging on hardware. Experience with ISM wireless bands is preferred and experience with any ARM cortex is even better. If you want to apply send your resume to nate@utdallas.edu!
